name: perl-fth

variants.name: hevea
variants.description: Use hevea when inputting LaTeX files (fth.pl -hevea)

variants.name: pdflatex
variants.description: Use pdflatex to make a LaTeX index file (fth.pl -latexindex)

description:
Ftagshtml is a Fortran (and simple C) to HTML browsing, resolves static
interface overload. It can handle some LaTeX comments inside the source
files. It only needs to be put somewhere into your disk since it uses
Perl. It also provides javatex2.pl initmak.pl getin.pl tex3ht.pl and
view.pl: (1) javatex2 complements latex2html to make nice browsing, (2)
initmak makes fortran 90 dependencies, either full deps or partial (when
interface is not modified it is silly to recompile everything) (3) getin
is an advanced search tool for Fortran variables and calls, (4) view.pl
is used for CGI search when source is on http server.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-cgi
dependencies.description:
CGI - Handle Common Gateway Interface requests and responses CGI was
included in the Perl distribution from 5.4 to 5.20 but has since been
removed.

dependencies.name: hevea
dependencies.description: Hevea a fast Latex to HTML translator

dependencies.name: texlive
dependencies.description:
TeX Live is an easy (we hope) way to get up and running with the TeX
document production system. It provides a comprehensive TeX system with
binaries for most flavors of Unix, including GNU/Linux, macOS, and also
Windows. It includes all the major TeX-related programs, macro packages,
and fonts that are free software, including support for many languages
around the world.

dependencies.name: coreutils
dependencies.description:
The GNU Core Utilities are the basic file, shell and text manipulation
utilities of the GNU operating system. These are the core utilities
which are expected to exist on every operating system.

dependencies.name: dos2unix
dependencies.description: DOS/Mac to Unix and vice versa text file format converter.
